coding_practice.title: Degree of an Array
coding_practice.description:
Given a non-empty array of non-negative integers nums, the degree of this array is defined as the maximum frequency of any one of its elements.

Your task is to find the smallest possible length of a (contiguous) subarray of nums, that has the same degree as nums.

examples.explanation: The input array has a degree of 2 because both elements 1 and 2 appear twice.\nOf the subarrays that have the same degree: [1, 2, 2, 3, 1], [1, 2, 2, 3], [2, 2, 3, 1], [1, 2, 2], [2, 2, 3], [2, 2].\nThe shortest length is 2. So return 2.
The degree is 3 because the element 2 is repeated 3 times.\nSo [2,2,3,1,4,2] is the shortest subarray, therefore returning 6.

coding_practice.constraints:
nums.length will be between 1 and 50,000.
nums[i] will be an integer between 0 and 49,999.
coding_practice.explanation:
1. 遍歷 nums，記錄每個元素的首次出現索引 left、最後出現索引 right 以及出現次數 count。
2. 計算整個數組的 degree，即最大頻率。
3. 遍歷 count，對於出現次數等於 degree 的元素，計算其子陣列長度 right[num]-left[num]+1，更新最小長度。
4. 返回 min_length 即為最短子陣列長度。
5. 時間複雜度 O(n)，空間複雜度 O(n)。
